Minify your JavaScript - Simple, Quick and Fast!

Input JavaScript

Minified Output

API

General

Perform a POST request to http://javascript-minifier.com/raw with the input parameter set to the JavaScript you want to minify.

POST http://javascript-minifier.com/raw?input=...

Curl

# minimising some JavaScript
curl -X POST -s --data-urlencode 'input=$(function() { alert("Hello, World!"); });' http://javascript-minifier.com/raw

# minimising a JS file (e.g. ready.js -> ready.min.js)
curl -X POST -s --data-urlencode 'input@ready.js' http://javascript-minifier.com/raw > ready.min.js

LWP Request

$ lwp-request -m POST http://javascript-minifier.com/raw
Please enter content (application/x-www-form-urlencoded) to be POSTed:
input=%24(function()%20%7B%20alert(%22Hello%2C%20World!%22)%3B%20%7D)%3B
^D

Send me more examples in your programming language.
